---
title: "1. Preprocessing"
---

```{r}
#| label: setup
#| warning: false

# load libs
library(tidyverse)
library(here)

# source custom code
source(here('scripts/setup.R'))
# define global variables

```

## Read Raw Data

```{r}
#| label: df_raw

df_raw <- read_csv(here('data/raw/raw_example.csv'))

# examine raw data
summary(df_raw)
```

## Preprocess Data

```{r}
#| label: df_clean

df_clean <-
  df_raw |>
  ## vs and and am are dichotomous -> change to logical values
  mutate(
    vs = as.logical(vs),
    am = as.logical(am)
  )

# examine cleaned data
summary(df_clean)
```

## Save Processed Data

```{r}
#| label: save_df
#| eval: false

write_csv(df_clean, here('data/processed/example.csv'))
```
